verse: There is no problem so big
God cannot solve it. There is no
mountain so tall, He cannot move it.
There is no storm so dark, God
cannot calm it. There is no sorrow
so deep, God cannot soothe it.
If He carried the weight of the world
my brother, that He will carry you.
If He carried the weight of the world
my sister, that He will carry you.
He said Come unto Me, all who
Are weary, And I will give you rest.
